will parade in front of us.

the same job, but one of them is lying.
We have to find out which one is lying.

associate of one of the 3 of us.

Before this video begins and we
move on to the trades, this video
is sponsored by Genshin Impact.

Genshin Impact is an open-world
RPG developed by HoYo Verse.

It's available on PC, cell phones,
PS4 and PS5, free-to-play.

You'll be able to choose from over 70
characters to form the best team.

Then, you'll have to go out and pulverize
monsters to gain experience and equipment.

To relax, you can simply explore,
cook or even fish in the vast regions.
Update 4.0 has just been released.

There are plenty of new features,
starting with a new region
inspired by France: Fontaine.

Is it possible to buy
a baguette or camembert there?

No, you won't be able to buy
a baguette or camembert,
but it does look like Paris.

The other big news in this update
is the creation of an underwater world.

You'll be able to get your
scuba diving license before

going out and killing all kinds
of aquatic creatures, to obtain
basic exploration skills.

For those of you with a phobia
of thalassotherapy, this
should work out just fine.
Look, it's adorable.

Finally, there are 3 new characters:
Lyney and Lynette, Teyvat's

most famous magician twins,
and their little brother Fréminet,
who feasts under the ocean.

It also sees the return of iconic characters
like the beloved Zhongli, as well

as Tartaglia and Yelan, who will
have their own dedicated banner.

In short, if you're planning to discover
or pick up Genshin Impact, now's the time.

You can download the game via the
QRcode that appears on the screen
via my link in the description.

Thanks again to Genshin Impact for sponsoring
the video, which starts straight away.
